column3: and I was such a fan of the Bacalao Croquette and the Deviled Egg. For our tapas plates
column4: as there was only two of us
column5: we got 4-one from each of the sections. We got the spinach and manchego stuffed mushrooms
column8: and the chicken and ham croquetas. I was a fan of all of them
column9: especially the croquetas and scallops. The croquetas practically melted in your mouth
column10: and the scallops were just the right consistency.
